sentences.en: " Was your watch improved by the jeweler? " " Only in a small degree. "
sentences.cn: “ 钟表商把你的表给修好了 吗 ? ” “ 只好了一点儿. ”

sentences.en: Francis went to a jeweler's and bought the girl a bracelet.
sentences.cn: 弗朗西斯到一家珠宝店,给那位姑娘买了一只手镯.

sentences.en: I told the jeweler to inscribe the ring with my name.
sentences.cn: 我叫珠宝商把我的名字刻在那只戒指上.

sentences.en: My nephew found a few dew drops on the Jewish jeweler's jewel.
sentences.cn: 侄儿发现犹太珠宝商之珠宝上有几滴露珠.

sentences.en: She fancied a necklace that she had seen in the jeweler's window.
sentences.cn: 她渴望自己曾经在宝石商的窗口中见到过的那条项链.

sentences.en: The diamond passed the scrutiny of the jeweler.
sentences.cn: 钻石通过了珠宝商的仔细检查.

sentences.en: The jeweler charges lots of money to set diamonds in a bracelet.
sentences.cn: 珠宝匠要很多钱才肯把钻石镶在手镯上.

sentences.en: The jeweler chose diamonds of the first water for the queen's crown.
sentences.cn: 珠宝商为女皇皇冠选择了最佳的钻石.

sentences.en: The jeweler cuts the metal band, inserts a new piece of metal in the gap.
sentences.cn: 珠宝匠切开金属箍带, 在缺口中嵌入一块新的金属.

sentences.en: The jeweler scrutinized the diamond for flaws .
sentences.cn: 宝石商人仔细察看钻石有无瑕 庇

sentences.en: The jeweler was able to dig up the ring we wanted.
sentences.cn: 宝石匠能发掘出我们想要的戒指.

sentences.en: The jeweler's display showed the diamonds to advantage.
sentences.cn: 珠宝商的展示使那些钻石更为醒目.

sentences.en: The jeweler's valuation of the diamond was ＄5, 000.
sentences.cn: 这珠宝商对这块钻石的估价是五千美元.

sentences.en: Visiting your jeweler a minimum of once a year is highly recommended.
sentences.cn: 专家们建议每年至少拜访你的宝石商一次.

sentences.en: What is the difference between a goal warden and a jeweler?
sentences.cn: 监狱长和珠宝商之间的区别是什么?

words.tran_cn: 珠宝商；宝石匠；钟表匠；钟表商

trans.tran_cn: 珠宝商，宝石匠，钟表商，钟表匠
